pkgmetadata.longdescription: Introduction to cfxdb=====================| |Version| |Build| |Deploy| |Docs|**cfxdb** is a Crossbar.io Python support package with core database access classeswritten in native Python. The package allows direct in-memory data access fromPython programs (including Jupyter notebooks) to CrossbarFX edge node data:* persisted WAMP event history* persisted router tracing data* XBR market maker transactions database* XBR network backend database* WAMP session cache* custom user, embedded object databases--------------*Copyright (c) typedef int GmbH. Licensed under MIT.WAMP, Crossbar.io and XBR are trademarks of Crossbar.io Technologies GmbH.*.. |Version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/cfxdb.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/cfxdb :alt: Version.. |Build| image:: https://github.com/crossbario/cfxdb/workflows/main/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/crossbario/cfxdb/actions?query=workflow%3Amain :alt: Build.. |Deploy| image:: https://github.com/crossbario/cfxdb/workflows/deploy/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/crossbario/cfxdb/actions?query=workflow%3Adeploy :alt: Deploy.. |Docs| image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/cfxdb/badge/?version=latest :target: https://cfxdb.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ :alt: Docs
